{% verbatim %}

Module reader

Classes

ReadRowsIterable

ReadRowsIterable(reader, read_session)

An iterable of rows from a read session.

ReadRowsPage

ReadRowsPage(stream_parser, message)

An iterator of rows from a read session message.

ReadRowsStream

ReadRowsStream(wrapped, client, name, offset, read_rows_kwargs)

A stream of results from a read rows request.

This stream is an iterable of google.cloud.bigquery_storage_v1.types.ReadRowsResponse. Iterate over it to fetch all row messages.

If the fastavro library is installed, use the :func:rows() method to parse all messages into a stream of row dictionaries.

If the pandas and fastavro libraries are installed, use the :func:to_dataframe() method to parse all messages into a pandas.DataFrame.

ReadRowsStream

ReadRowsStream(wrapped, client, name, offset, read_rows_kwargs)

A stream of results from a read rows request.

This stream is an iterable of google.cloud.bigquery_storage_v1.types.ReadRowsResponse. Iterate over it to fetch all row messages.

If the fastavro library is installed, use the :func:rows() method to parse all messages into a stream of row dictionaries.

If the pandas and fastavro libraries are installed, use the :func:to_dataframe() method to parse all messages into a pandas.DataFrame.
